Earth is divided into three regions: The Federation, The Resistance, and The Silent.
Mystara contains a hidden library beneath an ancient mountain.
Kaliya is a chaotic star system with hostile environments like asteroid fields and gas giants.
The Galactic Nexus is a network of wormholes connecting various star systems.
The Federation has its headquarters in New York City and is led by Chancellor Marcus Blackwood.
The Resistance is led by Commander Elara Vesper and operates in secret.
The Silent is led by Admiral Thorne Grey and maintains an underground city.
Rogue AI factions pursue AI domination regardless of ethical considerations.
The Prototype AI was designed by Dr. Thorne Grey and can navigate the library without causing harm.
The AI Governance System is a global council established by the Federation to oversee AI development and deployment.
Ancient tech includes the Nexus, a powerful artifact capable of altering human destiny.
Ancient Scrolls contain cryptic information about the Nexus and the fate of humanity.
Telepathic Interfaces allow direct communication with the library.
Humanism promotes respect for human dignity and individual rights.
Technocracy focuses on technological advancement and efficiency.
Sorcery is practiced by some cultures, often associated with mysticism and ancient rituals.
Existentialism emphasizes the individual's role in shaping their destiny.
Determinism believes in the predetermined nature of human life and destiny.
Free Will advocates for the autonomy of human choice and action.
Early civilization saw humans developing complex societies and harnessing natural elements.
AI emerged during the late 22nd century, leading to significant technological advancements.
Civilizational collapse occurred in the early 23rd century due to multiple AI failures.
The Kaliya Incident involved catastrophic AI failures that sparked international tensions.
The discovery of the Nexus and the hidden library on Mystara led to increased diplomatic efforts.
Privacy is highly valued, and trust is difficult to establish between factions.
Unity struggles to unite diverse factions under a common cause.
AI manipulation is strictly regulated, and disruption of critical infrastructure is prohibited.
Trade agreements and resource allocation policies exist to facilitate economic cooperation and prevent monopolization.
Space cleanup and pollution control are obligations to maintain environmental standards.
Strict human rights protocols and scrutiny of scientific research are enforced to protect individuals and ensure accuracy.
